text: Edward L. Romero (also Romæro, born on January 2, 1934) is an American politician and activist. He was the U.S. Ambassador to Spain and Andorra between the years of 1998 and 2001.Crónica El Mundo. EDWARD ROMERO: "Las mujeres mandan mucho, nos controlan" (In spanish: Chronicle El Mundo. EDWARD ROMERO: "Women control us"). Sunday, February 25, 2001 - Number 280. Retrieved July 30, 2012, to 1:35pm. ==References== ==Other websites== * Ambassador Romero Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Spain Category:Politicians from Colorado Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Edward L. Romero
